titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Divinity School STM Theses
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Joan R. Duffy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday March 26, 2019 at 22:17

did.unittitle: Yale Divinity School STM Theses
did.abstract: The theses in Series I (1975-1982) and those available in microfiche format in Series IV (1975-1995) were submitted for the S.T.M. degree at Yale Divinity School. The theses in Series II (1939-1956) were submitted to YDS during an earlier era. Series III contains a miscellaneous collection of theses that have some Yale connection. The theses in this collection are mostly from Yale Divinity School, but some theses related to Yale or its collections are also included.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Divinity School STM Theses (RG 41), Special Collections, Yale Divinity School Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Over the years there have been varying practices regarding the deposit of YDS theses in the Divinity Library. This collection is not comprehensive of all YDS theses ever submitted for degrees, but rather merely represents the ones that have been deposited in the library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The theses in Series I were submitted as partial fulfillment of the requirements for the S.T.M. degree at Yale Divinity School. This is not a comprehensive collection of all S.T.M. theses submitted to YDS. Selected papers were nominated for deposit in the Divinity School Library each year. The theses in Series II are those submitted to YDS during an earlier era, while those in Series III are a miscellaneous collection of theses with some Yale connection.
The papers are grouped by the year in which they were submitted and are arranged alphabetically by author within each year.
